TopicTitle: KSP RP forum server CPU usage exceeded.

Articles.Content: I\'d call the forum done, but unfortunately the webhost is having their servers blasted today, so it\'d be a bad idea for me to open today. That means we\'re going to have to go with a Tuesday opening if the servers are operable tomorrow. Thank you for your patience, everyone!
Good thing, I have all my RP stuff at home. I am at my dad\'s place until tomorrow night.

I\'d call the forum done, but unfortunately the webhost is having their servers blasted today, so it\'d be a bad idea for me to open today. That means we\'re going to have to go with a Tuesday opening if the servers are operable tomorrow. Thank you for your patience, everyone!

Could you define 'blasting'?

Could you define 'blasting'?

Being overwhelmed by traffic sufficiently to say

'We\'re sorry, the server is too busy at the moment, please reload this page in a few seconds.'

and being told on the forums of the host that sometimes the server is to busy to handle it. I know the server works, however, because yesterday things went operated just nicely.
Thanks for that clarification.
Man, I am small! 1,190 pixels small.
Lol building up my airforce with awesome planes.
Does anyone have a current map?
Wait... so this time the server went down before we even got onto it?

Wait... so this time the server went down before we even got onto it?

Down because of traffic. We\'ll have it back soon. Its not adverts.

Down because of traffic. We\'ll have it back soon. Its not adverts.

AWSHUM AWSHUM AWSHUM

i plan to militarise the mun
So today\'s the day? I can\'t wait

Being overwhelmed by traffic sufficiently to say

'We\'re sorry, the server is too busy at the moment, please reload this page in a few seconds.'

and being told on the forums of the host that sometimes the server is to busy to handle it. I know the server works, however, because yesterday things went operated just nicely.

Good grief! Who is your host? Do they power their servers with hamsters and gerbils?

Capt\'n Skunky

That isn\'t how you power a server?

You forget the hydroelectric goldfish.
Alright people the site thankfully seems to be running smoothly. Just give me a few minutes to write up a few batches and everything will be ready for the grand opening!

Alright people the site thankfully seems to be running smoothly. Just give me a few minutes to write up a few batches and everything will be ready for the grand opening!

WOOT! Good job man.
Alright, gentlemen listen up. I do not want to see a clusterfrak (aka cluster****) in the map, and the countries listed have been approved, I need to post the list up however.

Alright, gentlemen listen up. I do not want to see a clusterfrak (aka cluster****) in the map, and the countries listed have been approved, I need to post the list up however.

What do you mean by cluster**** in the map?

With people yelling at each other, here is the list of confirmed:

Avienne: Radion Space Works

UoSoV: Imandreas

Aries: Lord Wasteland

Safira: RedDwarfIV

Jeb_Kerman: Triumvirate of Lunus

Masitas: Charzy

Gritania: Grove

Voinein: Mincespy

Forseti: Tim_Barret

KSR: Kryten

Aesea: James510

Makavi: Ping111

Rigentem: 707 Engineering

Entokian Confederation: BHD124

Ceylysias: JuonKiku
Did you manage to put the nation threads back up like you thought you might have been able to?

I have them, its just I don\'t want to put them up, otherwise the nation owner wouldn\'t be able to edit them.

Also, I won\'t be releasing the link here yet. In order to put as little stress on the site as possible, we\'re going to do a controlled opening. First the nation owners will be let in, then those that passed the test (if they haven\'t gotten a nation yet, or are a corp), then, after we\'re settled in, I\'ll post the link. No RP\'ing will be done today. Today is FAQ/Setup Day.
Nice, so I was completely removed from the RP it seems according to LW\'s list.
Juon, then what is your country exactly? I did not see it.
